Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
com.pekings.pos.controller.OrderController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/orders") public class OrderController extends Object
REST Controller for managing Order-related operations. Provides endpoints for CRUD operations and querying orders based on various criteria.

  • Method Details

    • getOrder

      @GetMapping("/{id}") public Order getOrder(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      Retrieves an order by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The order with the given ID, or null if not found.

    • getPreviousOrder

      @GetMapping("/past/{amount}") public List<Order> getPreviousOrder(@PathVariable("amount") int amount)
      Retrieves a specified number of recent orders.
      Parameters:
      amount - The number of recent orders to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of recent orders within the specified limit.

    • getDailyRevenue

      @GetMapping("/past/day") public List<SaleHistoryItem> getDailyRevenue()
      Retrieves the daily revenue and order statistics.
      Returns:
      A list of revenue and order statistics for the current day.

    • getOrdersByStatus

      @GetMapping("/status/{status}") public List<Order> getOrdersByStatus(@PathVariable("status") String status)
      Retrieves orders filtered by their status.
      Parameters:
      status - The status to filter orders by.
      Returns:
      A list of orders with the specified status.

    • getOrderItems

      @GetMapping("/{id}/menuitems") public List<OrderItem> getOrderItems(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      Retrieves all menu items in an order by the order's ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order.
      Returns:
      A list of order items associated with the order.

    • getCustomerOrders

      @GetMapping("/customer/{id}") public List<Order> getCustomerOrders(@PathVariable("id") int id)
      Retrieves all orders made by a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the customer.
      Returns:
      A list of orders associated with the customer.

    • updateOrderStatus

      @PatchMapping("/update/status/{id}") public Order updateOrderStatus(@PathVariable("id") int id, @RequestParam("status") String newStatus)
      Updates the status of an existing order.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order to update.
      newStatus - The new status to set for the order.
      Returns:
      The updated order with the new status.

    • addOrder

      @PostMapping("/add") public Order addOrder(@RequestBody Order order)
      Adds a new order to the system. Sample request: 
       {
     "customer": { "id": 503 },
     "employee": { "id": 3 },
     "time": "2024-11-13T02:47:03.484Z",
     "price": 10.63,
     "payment_method": "credit_card",
     "items": [
         {
             "menuItem": { "id": 6 },
             "extras": [
                 {
                     "ingredient": {
                         "id": 5
                     },
                     "amount": -1
                 }
             ]
         }
     ]
 }
      Parameters:
      order - The order to add.
      Returns:
      The newly added order after saving to the database.

    • deleteOrder

      @DeleteMapping("/delete") public void deleteOrder(@RequestBody int id)
      Deletes an order by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order to delete.
